features.title: Research success criteria endpoints integration for quality management systems
features.description: Research and design success criteria endpoints integration for task quality management. Research areas: 1) Quality Gate Systems - how modern systems implement quality criteria, 2) Success Criteria Templates - 25-point audit system integration patterns, 3) Project-Wide Inheritance - how global criteria propagate to individual tasks, 4) Validation Workflows - automated vs manual criteria validation patterns, 5) Reporting Dashboard - success criteria tracking and reporting mechanisms. API Design Focus: POST /api/success-criteria/task/:taskId endpoint design, POST /api/success-criteria/project-wide endpoint patterns, GET /api/success-criteria/:taskId response structures, Integration with existing audit workflow. Deliverables: Success criteria API specification, Integration workflow design, Validation pattern recommendations, Dashboard data requirements.

features.title: CRITICAL: Comprehensive Puppeteer Testing - Absolute Perfection Required
features.description: Comprehensive testing of the entire codebase using Puppeteer with persistent single tab on single browser. ULTIMATE TESTING MANDATE: Test EVERY page, click EVERY button, use EVERY feature with authentic user simulation including realistic pauses between interactions. PERFECTION STANDARD: Everything must work, look professional and modern with unified color scheme. CRITICAL REQUIREMENTS: 1) Screenshot documentation at EVERY step - before/after each action 2) Console log capture and analysis for ALL interactions 3) Professional UI validation - NO white text on white background, text must be black/visible/clear, backgrounds lighter colored 4) Error Protocol: If ANY errors found, create new tasks with HIGHER PRIORITY to fix immediately 5) Authentic user behavior with pauses between page transitions and clicks 6) Use existing Puppeteer tests if available, do not create new ones 7) Visual quality assurance - unified color scheme, professional appearance 8) ONLY ABSOLUTE COMPLETION PERFECTION ACCEPTED. Quality Requirements: Professional, slick, modern appearance with clear visibility. Focus: Puppeteer tests are PRIMARY FOCUS until perfection achieved.

features.title: Implement CLAUDE.md Simplification & FEATURES.json Migration Plan
features.description: Complete system overhaul: 1) Simplify CLAUDE.md from 800+ to ~300 lines removing complex protocols, 2) Rename TODO.json to FEATURES.json with approval workflow, 3) Update stop-hook.js references, 4) Refactor taskmanager API for feature management only, 5) Integrate native TodoWrite as primary task management, 6) Maintain quality standards without over-engineering. Deploy 6 concurrent agents for multi-component implementation.

features.title: Simplify CLAUDE.md from 800+ lines to streamlined 300 lines
features.description: Remove complex protocols while maintaining essential quality standards. Remove: mandatory taskmanager initialization, RAG-first workflows, complex preparation checklists. Preserve: linter protocols, git workflow, security scanning, code quality standards

features.title: Refactor taskmanager-api.js to feature-only management system
features.description: Transform taskmanager-api.js from task management to exclusive feature management with strict approval workflow. Remove all task management endpoints (init, create, complete, claim). Implement feature lifecycle: suggest-feature, approve-feature, reject-feature, list-features, feature-stats. Replace TODO.json with FEATURES.json. Enforce suggested → approved → implemented status flow.

features.title: Preserve quality standards while simplifying CLAUDE.md
features.description: Analyze current CLAUDE.md file and streamline it while preserving essential quality standards including linter protocols, security scanning, git workflows, code quality standards, professional practices, and concurrent deployment capabilities. Remove over-engineered preparation protocols and complex workflow checklists.

features.title: Execute TODO.json to FEATURES.json migration with new approval workflow schema
features.description: Migrate TODO.json to FEATURES.json with new schema supporting suggested/approved/implemented status workflow. Create backup, transform data structure, validate migration success.

features.title: Update stop-hook.js to reference FEATURES.json instead of TODO.json
features.description: Systematically update all references in stop-hook.js from TODO.json to FEATURES.json. This includes: file path constants, validation checks, cleanup functions, console messages, error handling, and any hardcoded strings. Ensure full compatibility with new file structure while maintaining system functionality.

suggested.description: Feature suggested but not yet approved

rejected.description: Feature rejected and will not be implemented
